page.title: 12Places People Live II
page.content: {Balgowan Square}is a piece of waste ground between Balgowan Avenue and Helmsdale Avenue. It is a bleak place where a church hall stood until it was burned down in 1973. Since then grass has been planted but nothing else has been done to it. Dundee Institute of Architects ran a competition to convert a piece into a play area and we thought of the square. We measured it and consulted the play furniture catalogues. Then we made a scale plan of the square. Now we are just waiting for the District Council to put our plan into action!! Not far from our school runs the old {Dundee to Newtyle Railway.}Though the line was closed in 1955 it had been very busy in the 19th Century carrying farm produce,livestock and linen into Dundee and coal,manure and manufactured goods out to Newtyle.
